content:
Hi, I work for Ripple and we're looking into integrating WAMR into https://github.com/XRPLF/rippled/ (the software that runs the XRP Ledger). We generally only use secure components, and prefer that they are audited by third parties, given the magnitude of issues if there was a vulnerability.

Do you have any such recent-ish audit that we can look at? Is there someone I can contact about this?

GitHub - XRPLF/rippled: Decentralized cryptocurrency blockchain daemon implementing the XRP Ledger protocol in C++
Decentralized cryptocurrency blockchain daemon implementing the XRP Ledger protocol in C++ - XRPLF/rippled
Sorry for the delayed response. As far as I know, there is no audit-like process for WAMR.
